_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Good Morning Skiers and Riders! This is Eli with your 5 am snow report for Thursday, January 1st. Remember the easiest way to get up to date information is on the Ikon Pass app or website.  

Our Mid mountain base is 17 inches, the temperature is 39 degrees, the winds are 5 miles per hour from the west, with clear skies. 

The Summit base is 28 inches, the temperature is 28 degrees, the winds 14 miles per hour from the west. 

The base temperature is 17 degrees.  

We will be skiing and riding on 19 lifts, 63 runs, and 591 acres on packed powder and machine made snow.  

Wind down your day the Steamboat Way at Sunset Happy Hour, with aprs vibes, live music, and sweeping mountain views. Tickets sold at the Steamboat Gondola in-person only at the time of the event. 

Stay in the know with the Ikon Pass App. Find it in the app store on your mobile device and get lift and trail statuses, conditions updates, and more.  

If you are thinking of exploring outside the ski area boundaries, and dont know exactly where you are going, dont go.  

Ski and Ride with Care and we will see you on the mountain!
